name: brushless-gimbal-BruGi
short_description:
This is a camera stabilization system based on a dedicated controller hardware. The controller software is provided as an Arduino project.
A tcl based GUI (graphics user interface) is provided to ease parameter settings and tuning.

Brushless Gimbal Controller by Ludwig Färber (Hardware and Software) , Alexander Rehfeldt (Software), Christian Winkler (Software) and Alois Hahn (Software)

A good source for instructions and setup issues you find here
http://www.itsqv.com/QVW/index.php?title=How_To_-_Martinez_Brushless_Gimbal_Controller_Set-Up


rcgroups forum, Martinez board / Open source brushless gimbal HELP THREAD
http://www.rcgroups.com/forums/showthread.php?t=1901828

fpv-community forum, Brushless Gimbal Controller - SOFTWARE (german language)
http://fpv-community.de/showthread.php?20795-Brushless-Gimbal-Controller-SOFTWARE

This project had been migrated from http://code.google.com/p/brushless-gimbal on Jan 10, 2014
summary: Brushless Gimbal Controller for Camera Stabilization
